LanguageData.OCC_Helmet.label: OCC Knight Helmet
LanguageData.OCC_Helmet.description: Heavy power armor Helmet, excellent protects the owner. Designed for use by the OCC Knights.
LanguageData.OCC_Helmet_M.label: OCC Paladin Helmet
LanguageData.OCC_Helmet_M.description: Heavy power armor Helmet, excellent protects the owner. Designed and modified for use by OCC Paladins.\n\nThe hardened version provides more protection to the owner.
LanguageData.OCC_Helmet_M_Spacer.label: OCC Paladin Helmet(Space Griffin)
LanguageData.OCC_Helmet_M_Spacer.description: Heavy power armor Helmet, excellent protects the owner. Designed and modified for use by OCC Paladins.\n\nPressure-sealed version designed to keep the occupant alive in outer space.
LanguageData.OCC_Helmet_M_Melee.label: OCC Paladin Helmet(Gladiator)
LanguageData.OCC_Helmet_M_Melee.description: Heavy power armor Helmet, excellent protects the owner. Designed and modified for use by OCC Paladins.\n\nModified visor with analyzing computer that helps the user close combat.
LanguageData.OCC_Helmet_M_Ranged.label: OCC Paladin Helmet(Ranger)
LanguageData.OCC_Helmet_M_Ranged.description: Heavy power armor Helmet, excellent protects the owner. Designed and modified for use by OCC Paladins.\n\nModified visor with targeting computer that helps the user aim.
LanguageData.OCC_Helmet_M_Mechanitor.label: OCC Paladin Helmet(Overseer)
LanguageData.OCC_Helmet_M_Mechanitor.description: Heavy power armor Helmet, excellent protects the owner. Designed and modified for use by OCC Paladins.\n\nModified for improves Mechanoids Control abilities.
LanguageData.OCC_Armor.label: OCC Knight Armor
LanguageData.OCC_Armor.description: Heavy power armor, excellent protects the owner with little mobility restriction. Designed for use by the OCC Knights.
LanguageData.OCC_Armor_M.label: OCC Paladin Armor
LanguageData.OCC_Armor_M.description: Heavy power armor, excellent protects the owner with little mobility restriction. Designed and modified for use by OCC Paladins.\n\nThe hardened version provides more protection to the owner.
LanguageData.OCC_Armor_M_Spacer.label: OCC Paladin Armor(Space Griffin)
LanguageData.OCC_Armor_M_Spacer.description: Heavy power armor, excellent protects the owner with little mobility restriction. Designed and modified for use by OCC Paladins.\n\nPressure-sealed version designed to keep the occupant alive in outer space.
LanguageData.OCC_Armor_M_Jump.label: OCC Paladin Armor(Raven)
LanguageData.OCC_Armor_M_Jump.verbs.Verb_Jump.label: OCC Paladin Armor(Raven)
LanguageData.OCC_Armor_M_Jump.description: Heavy power armor, excellent protects the owner with little mobility restriction. Designed and modified for use by OCC Paladins.\n\nModified with the addition of a Jump pack.
LanguageData.OCC_Armor_M_Grenadier.label: OCC Paladin Armor(Exploder)
LanguageData.OCC_Armor_M_Grenadier.description: Heavy power armor, excellent protects the owner with little mobility restriction. Designed and modified for use by OCC Paladins.\n\nModified by installing the Blast Grenade Launcher.
LanguageData.OCC_Armor_M_Shield.label: OCC Paladin Armor(Guardian)
LanguageData.OCC_Armor_M_Shield.description: Heavy power armor, excellent protects the owner with little mobility restriction. Designed and modified for use by OCC Paladins.\n\nModified with the addition of a Reinforced Barrier.
LanguageData.OCC_Armor_M_Barrier.label: OCC Paladin Armor(Protector)
LanguageData.OCC_Armor_M_Barrier.description: Heavy power armor, excellent protects the owner with little mobility restriction. Designed and modified for use by OCC Paladins.\n\nModified with the addition of the Universal Barrier.
LanguageData.OCC_Armor_M_ForceField.label: OCC Paladin Armor(Warden)
LanguageData.OCC_Armor_M_ForceField.description: Heavy power armor, excellent protects the owner with little mobility restriction. Designed and modified for use by OCC Paladins.\n\nModified with the addition of a Low-Shield pack.
LanguageData.OCC_Armor_M_Mechanitor.label: OCC Paladin Armor(Overseer)
LanguageData.OCC_Armor_M_Mechanitor.description: Heavy power armor, excellent protects the owner with little mobility restriction. Designed and modified for use by OCC Paladins.\n\nModified with the addition of a Mechanoids Control pack.
LanguageData.OCC_Armor_M_Turret.label: OCC Paladin Armor(Goblin)
LanguageData.OCC_Armor_M_Turret.description: Heavy power armor, excellent protects the owner with little mobility restriction. Designed and modified for use by OCC Paladins.\n\nModified with the pack that allows the user to deploy a battery-powered turret.
LanguageData.OCC_Grenade.label: Blast Grenade
LanguageData.Grenade_Armor_OCC_TurretPack.label: OCC turret pack capsule
